cab.content: his document is the property of Hi8.3ritanni^^Decisionsjof the Supreme Cornell of the Allies.The following decisions taken this afternoon in regard to Batoum are circulated "by direction of the Prime Minister for the information of the Cabinet :-(a) That Batoum should be a Free Port underthe guarantee of the League of nations:(b) That for'the present an Allied cor. op sitegarrison should be maintained at 3atoum consisting of one British, one Trench and one.Italian battalion.(sgd) M.P.A.BMREY,i, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1. 25th February 1920./ Vv.CAB I N E T.ceet729 107(Circulated for information in connection with the decision of the Supreme Council on February 23j?d, 1920.)
